about_the_game:
This is a GenAI-empowered 💡 auto battler game that focuses on 💖 love and adventure 🦄! We have adapted the Chinese classic featuring twelve iconic beauties 🌸, into 12 gripping science fiction 🤖 stories. The stories are set on twelve planets 🪐 in a distant galaxy 🌠.

  • In the game, you play as an ordinary teenage girl 👧 who traverses into this parallel world. Your mission is to save the destinies of the twelve girls in the story.

  • You will utilize the popular MBTI personality types 🧬 to arrange and combine characters from "Dream of the Red Chamber" for battles, embarking on a magnificent adventure across the galaxy 🌌.

  • 88 Tarot cards 🔮 await you to unlock, prophesying the destinies of the major characters. Each card holds mysterious clues, guiding your romantic journey.

Let us take you into the marvelous world of KOROMU, where you can experience the perfect fusion of classic literature 📜, science fiction elements 🛸, and strategic gameplay 🕹️. The destinies of the twelve girls intertwine in this magical world, and you will become their guardian. Are you ready to embark on this journey full of surprises 🌟 and adventures ✨?
